## Connection class

Class for a connection between blocks.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Connection implements IASTNodeLocationWithBlock 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [IASTNodeLocationWithBlock](./blockly.iastnodelocationwithblock_interface.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [connect\_(childConnection)](./blockly.connection_class.connect__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Connect two connections together. This is the connection on the superior block. |
|  [connect(otherConnection)](./blockly.connection_class.connect_1_method.md) |  | Connect this connection to another connection. |
|  [disconnect()](./blockly.connection_class.disconnect_1_method.md) |  | Disconnect this connection. |
|  [disconnectInternal\_(parentBlock, childBlock)](./blockly.connection_class.disconnectinternal__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Disconnect two blocks that are connected by this connection. |
|  [getCheck()](./blockly.connection_class.getcheck_1_method.md) |  | Get a connection's compatibility. |
|  [getConnectionForOrphanedConnection(startBlock, orphanConnection)](./blockly.connection_class.getconnectionfororphanedconnection_1_method.md) | <code>static</code> | Returns the connection (starting at the startBlock) which will accept the given connection. This includes compatible connection types and connection checks. |
|  [getShadowDom(returnCurrent)](./blockly.connection_class.getshadowdom_1_method.md) |  | Returns the xml representation of the connection's shadow block. |
|  [getShadowState(returnCurrent)](./blockly.connection_class.getshadowstate_1_method.md) |  | Returns the serialized object representation of the connection's shadow block. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.connection_class.getsourceblock_1_method.md) |  | Get the source block for this connection. |
|  [isConnected()](./blockly.connection_class.isconnected_1_method.md) |  | Is the connection connected? |
|  [isSuperior()](./blockly.connection_class.issuperior_1_method.md) |  | Does the connection belong to a superior block (higher in the source stack)? |
|  [onCheckChanged\_()](./blockly.connection_class.oncheckchanged__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Function to be called when this connection's compatible types have changed. |
|  [respawnShadow\_()](./blockly.connection_class.respawnshadow__1_method.md) | <code>protected</code> | Respawn the shadow block if there was one connected to the this connection. |
|  [setCheck(check)](./blockly.connection_class.setcheck_1_method.md) |  | Change a connection's compatibility. |
|  [setShadowDom(shadowDom)](./blockly.connection_class.setshadowdom_1_method.md) |  | Changes the connection's shadow block. |
|  [setShadowState(shadowState)](./blockly.connection_class.setshadowstate_1_method.md) |  | Changes the connection's shadow block. |
|  [targetBlock()](./blockly.connection_class.targetblock_1_method.md) |  | Returns the block that this connection connects to. |
|  [toString()](./blockly.connection_class.tostring_1_method.md) |  | This method returns a string describing this Connection in developer terms (English only). Intended to on be used in console logs and errors. |
